item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-07-12
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Harpoon IPA @ The Pour House #
  • Christine & Keith @ The Pour House #
  • I'm at Blue Ribbon BBQ (908 Massachusetts Avenue, Arlington). #
  • RT: Brian just got a new MacBook pro at chestnut hill apple store (via @ckirsten) #
  • Rib sandwich w/ Cole slaw & grits @ Blue Ribbon BBQ (neon light coloring it orange) #
  • My new Macbook Pro #
  • RT: Web standards secret sauce: Webkit + Apple (via @zeldman) #
  • Sigh, new Macbook working fine then upgraded to 10.5.7, now wireless isn't working. ARGH!!!! #
  • I'm at Aquitaine Bis (11 Boylston St, Chestnut Hill). #
  • Wi-fi on MBP not working looks like I have to reinstall Leopard clean. Doh! #
  • Just got back from a bike ride, tired but feeling good. Firste ride since we moved to Boston a year ago. #
  • Now reformating MBP and just going to install sofware from scratch. :-S #

Powered by Twitter Tools.
